incidents.name: Elevated 400s Error for Programmable Chat and Flex

incident_updates.body: The data replication delays related to legacy chat messaging is now operating normally. We will continue to monitor for system stability. We'll provide another update in 2 hours, or as soon as more information becomes available.

The data replication delays related to legacy chat messaging is now operating normally. We will continue to monitor for system stability. We'll provide another update in 30 minutes or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are experiencing data replication delays related to legacy chat messaging. Customers may face errors when using Programmable Chat and Flex. Our engineers are working on the issue, and we will provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are experiencing data replication delays related to legacy chat messaging. Customers may face errors when using Programmable Chat and Flex. Our engineers are working on the issue, and we will provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.
We've become aware of a potential issue with Programmable Chat. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.

incidents.name: SMS Delivery Report Delays when sending to Subset of Shortcode to US Cellular Corp

incident_updates.body: We are continuing to experience delays in receiving message delivery reports when sending the subset of Shortcode to US Cellular Corp. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We expect to provide another update in 2 hours, or as soon as more information becomes available.

incident_updates.body: Our monitoring systems have detected a potential issue with A2P Registration. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.

We continue to experience call errors though Rest API. Customers may experience calls price delays, missing calls when fetching the list resource. Also, since the start of the incident, calls that were deleted could still show up and calls done could be missing in the list. Our engineers are working to resolve the issue. We expect to provide another update in 8 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We continue to experience call errors though Rest API. Customers may experience calls price delays, missing calls when fetching the list resource. Also, since the start of the incident, calls that were deleted could still show up and calls done could be missing in the list. Our engineers are working to resolve the issue. We expect to provide another update in 4 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We continue to experience call errors though Rest API. Customers may experience calls price delays, missing calls when fetching the list resource. We expect to provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

After a couple of minutes monitoring, we are still experiencing call errors though Rest API. Customers may experience calls price delays, missing calls when fetching the list resource. Also, since the start of the incident, calls that were deleted could still show up and calls done could be missing in the list. Our engineers are working to resolve the issue. We expect to provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

Rest API are now operating normally. Customers should be able to retrieve calls info through Rest API.  We will continue to monitor for system stability. We'll provide another update in 30 minutes or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are currently investigating call errors though Rest API. Customers may experience calls price delays, missing calls when fetching the list resource. Also, since 9:20 am, calls that were deleted could still show up and calls done could be missing in the list. Our engineers are working on the issue, and we will provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

Our monitoring systems have detected a potential issue with calls price delays. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.

incidents.name: Deleting Historical Calls Not Being Registered in Database

incident_updates.body: The issue with deleting historical calls for a subset of customers isn't fully recovered yet. Our engineers continue to work to ensure fully stability. We'll provide another update in 24 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

incidents.name: SMS Delivery Report Delays When Sending Messages to Far EasTone Network in Taiwan

The Megafon Network Operator in Russia is conducting a planned maintenance from 06 December 2022 at 12:00 PST until 06 December 2022 at 16:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from Megafon Russia handsets.

scheduled_maintenances.name: SMS Carrier Partner Maintenance to Multiple Countries

incident_updates.body: We will be undergoing scheduled maintenance during this time.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS Delivery Notifications & Status Callbacks

incident_updates.body:
Our SMS carrier partner is conducting a planned maintenance from 06 December 2022 at 13:00 PST until 06 December 2022 at 14:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from the following countries via a subset of longcodes.

Germany,
Spain,
United Kingdom,
Brazil.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS Delivery Notifications & Status Callbacks

incident_updates.body: The Beeline network in Russia is conducting a planned maintenance from 06 December 2022 at 14:00 PST until 06 December 2022 at 17:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from Beeline Russia handsets.

Our SMS carrier partner in Australia is conducting a planned maintenance from 07 December 2022 at 00:30 PST until 07 December 2022 at 01:30 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays receiving incoming SMS from Australia handsets.

The Beeline network in Russia is conducting a planned maintenance from 07 December 2022 at 11:00 PST until 07 December 2022 at 16:30 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from Beeline Russia handsets.

Our Voice carrier partner in Singapore is conducting an emergency maintenance from 07 December 2022 at 16:00 PST until 07 December 2022 at 18:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be call disconnections to and from a subset of Singapore phone numbers.

scheduled_maintenances.name: US and Canada SMS Carrier Partner Maintenance

incident_updates.body: Our SMS carrier partner in the US and Canada will be conducting planned maintenance from 07 December 2022 at 20:00 PDT until 08 December 2022 at 00:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from both US and Canada handsets via Toll-free numbers

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS Toll-Free, North America

incident_updates.body: Our MMS carrier partner in the US is conducting planned maintenance from 07 December 2022 at 20:00 PDT until 08 December 2022 at 00:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering MMS to and from US handsets via US Toll-free numbers.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - MMS Toll-Free, North America

scheduled_maintenances.name: Planned Maintenance for Flex Insights Historical Reporting

incident_updates.body: The Flex Insights Historical Reporting dashboards visualisation partner in the US is conducting a planned maintenance on Saturday, December 10th, 2022, at 1:00 AM Pacific Standard Time. The maintenance window is planned to take up to 2 hours 30 minutes. During the maintenance window Flex Insights Historical Reporting access will be unavailable.

The Beeline network in Russia is conducting a planned maintenance from 12 December 2022 at 10:00 PST until 12 December 2022 at 16:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from Beeline Russia handsets.

The Legos Telecom network in France is conducting a planned maintenance from 14 December 2022 at 04:00 PST until 14 December 2022 at 05:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from Legos Telecom France handsets.

scheduled_maintenances.name: US and Canada SMS Carrier Partner Maintenance

During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from both US and Canada handsets via Toll-free numbers

The Tele2 network in Russia is conducting a planned maintenance from 05 December 2022 at 12:00 PST through to 26 December 2022 at 16:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from Tele2 Russia handsets.

Note, the maintenance will be carried out on each of the following dates and times:

05 December 2022 at 12:00 PST until 05 December 2022 at 16:00 PST
06 December 2022 at 12:00 PST until 06 December 2022 at 16:00 PST
07 December 2022 at 12:00 PST until 07 December 2022 at 16:00 PST
12 December 2022 at 12:00 PST until 12 December 2022 at 16:00 PST
14 December 2022 at 12:00 PST until 14 December 2022 at 16:00 PST
19 December 2022 at 12:00 PST until 19 December 2022 at 16:00 PST
21 December 2022 at 12:00 PST until 21 December 2022 at 16:00 PST
26 December 2022 at 12:00 PST until 26 December 2022 at 16:00 PST
